name: Premier Eye Care of Florida LLC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Premier Eye Care of Florida LLC is a Exclusive Provider Organization provider based in Coral Gables, FL. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $53.6M in Medicaid payments across 1.6M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $53.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
